雅事.definition: refined activities of the intellectuals (regarding literature, paintings etc)

雅人.definition: poetic individual; person of refined temperament

雅俗共賞.definition: can be enjoyed by scholars and lay-people alike (idiom)

雅典的泰門.definition: Timon of Athens, 1607 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚[Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4]

雅各書.definition: Epistle of St James (in New Testament)

雅各賓派.definition: Jacobin club, French revolutionary party that played a leading role in the reign of terror 1791-1794

雅安市.definition: Ya'an, prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province 四川省[Si4chuan1 Sheng3]

雅座.definition: (restaurant etc) private room; booth; comfortable seating

雅意.definition: your kind offer; your valued advice; delicate interest and charm

雅拉神山.definition: Mt Yarla Shampo, in Dawu County 道孚縣|道孚县[Dao4 fu2 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan

雅拉雪山.definition: Mt Yarla Shampo, in Dawu County 道孚縣|道孚县[Dao4 fu2 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan

雅拉香波神山.pinyin: Ya3 la1 Xiang1 bo1 shen2 shan1
雅拉香波神山.definition: Mt Yarla Shampo, in Dawu County 道孚縣|道孚县[Dao4 fu2 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan

雅拉香波雪山.pinyin: Ya3 la1 Xiang1 bo1 xue3 shan1
雅拉香波雪山.definition: Mt Yarla Shampo, in Dawu County 道孚縣|道孚县[Dao4 fu2 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan

雅教.definition: (hon.) your distinguished thoughts; Thank you (for your esteemed contribution to our discussion).

雅樂.definition: formal ceremonial music of each succeeding Chinese dynasty starting with the Zhou; Korean a'ak; Japanese gagaku

雅歌.definition: part of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经; a song; a poem set to elegant music; a refined chant; the biblical Song of Solomon

雅正.definition: correct (literary); upright; (hon.) Please point out my shortcomings.; I await your esteemed corrections.

雅江.definition: Yajiang county (Tibetan: nyag chu rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州, Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

雅江縣.definition: Yajiang county (Tibetan: nyag chu rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

雅片.definition: variant of 鴉片|鸦片[ya1 pian4]

雅礱江.definition: Yalong river of Tibet and Sichuan

雅禮協會.definition: Yale-China Association, independent organization founded in 1901

雅美族.definition: Tao or Yami, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

雅興.definition: refined and elegant attitude of mind

雅號.definition: refined appelation; (humor) sb's elegant monicker; (hon.) your esteemed name

雅鄭.definition: court music and vulgar music (i.e. 雅樂|雅乐[ya3 yue4], music of the court, and 鄭聲|郑声[Zheng4 sheng1], music of the state of Zheng, which was regarded as lewd)

雅量.definition: magnanimity; tolerance; high capacity for drinking

雅間.definition: private room (in a restaurant, bath house, etc)

雅魯藏布大峽谷.pinyin: Ya3 lu3 zang4 bu4 Da4 xia2 gu3
雅魯藏布大峽谷.definition: Great Canyon of Yarlung Tsangpo-Brahmaputra (through the southeast Himalayas, from Tibet to Assam and Bangladesh)
